quest.name: Extinguishing the Last Light
journal: Judging by the portentous look in his eye, Chai-Nuzz has something important to tell you.

Chai-Nuzz informs you everything is in place, and that the Talos is ready to be awakened. Only the imbuing remains to be done, after which the enormous golem will rise to take Mt. Gulg in its grasp─assuming all goes according to plan. Once the process is set in motion, there will be no turning back, so the Exarch bids you see to your battle preparations, that he might then give the order to begin.

As all present hold their collective breaths, the Talos wakes to life and proceeds to reach out for the volcano. Excitement quickly gives way to dismay, however, as the sin eaters guarding Vauthry's domain converge upon the golem's vulnerable hands, threatening to end your mission before it has begun. For a blessing, help then arrives in the unexpected form of the fae folk, who engage the sin eaters from the air and allow the Talos to safely complete its task. With the route to Vauthry thus secured, you make haste to join your fellow Scions at the foot of Mt. Gulg.

Your comrades all know their purpose, and there is no further need for words. In silence, you set forth for the grueling climb that will see you traverse the Talos's stony body on your way to Vauthry's newly built paradise.

※To enlist your companion NPCs for this duty, speak with them near the entrance or access Duty Support via the main menu. Use the Duty Finder if you wish to complete the instance alongside fellow players.

Fighting your way through hordes of sin eaters, you arrive at the upper reaches of Mt. Gulg. The end is in sight.

※In the event that you leave the instance, you may proceed to the Crown of the Immaculate by speaking with the sentry at the foot of Mt. Gulg.

As you approach Vauthry's private sanctuary, he unleashes a horde of sin eaters upon you. While your comrades keep the creatures at bay, you must press on to fulfill your mission's objective: striking down the final Lightwarden.

※The Crown of the Immaculate can be accessed via the Duty Finder.

At the end of a furious encounter, you succeed in laying low Vauthry's ultimate incarnation, Innocence. Their own foes having fled, your comrades join you just in time to witness your broken adversary's final moments.

※In the event that you leave the instance, you may proceed to the Crown of the Immaculate by speaking with the sentry at the foot of Mt. Gulg.

Succumbing to his wounds at last, Vauthry's body dissolves into innumerable motes of light, which you stoically take unto yourself. At that instant, the blazing shroud covering the firmament falls away to reveal a peaceful night sky. You do not have a chance to relish the sight, however, as you find yourself pulled into a vision of Vauthry's past, when he was but a babe in the womb. He too, you discover, was a pawn of the Ascians, born as man and sin eater both to bring about the First's Rejoining.

Even as the vision fades, your entire being is racked by pain. What all had feared is coming to pass─you are unable to contain the combined power of all the Wardens. In that moment, the Crystal Exarch arrives, his true plan finally revealed. From the beginning, it was his intent to take your unbearable burden upon himself, and teleport into the rift in a final act of sacrifice. But before he can complete his ritual, a shot rings out and he crumples to the floor. Holding the smoking gun is none other than Emet-Selch, come to prevent his painstakingly amassed Light from being spirited away. Declaring you unworthy to be his ally, the Ascian leaves with the wounded Exarch, though not before inviting you to seek him out at his abode, in the dark depths of the Tempest.

Some time later, you awaken in your chambers with Ardbert watching over you. Your spectral companion duly explains the events that took place after you lost consciousness. You learn it is only thanks to Ryne's powers that you have not yet turned into a sin eater, but that it is only a matter of time. Bile rising in your throat, you throw open the window...and look out upon a land shrouded in Light once more─all of your efforts having come to naught. Seeing your despair, Ardbert urges you to get some fresh air outside the confines of your room.

※The next main scenario quest will be available from the manager of suites in the Pendants.
objectives: Confront Innocence in the Crown of the Immaculate.

dialogue.name: DULIACHAI
dialogue.text: The Exarch is back, thank heavens, and it seems the sea breeze did him a world of good! I do hope you managed to get a spot of rest as well!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Worry not, my friend. I am quite well. Let us ask Master Chai where things stand with the Talos.

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: Right, so, while the two of you were away, I received word that everything is in place, meaning we can proceed with awakening the Talos.

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: Once we imbue the magic, it will stir itself and immediately carry out its designated function: namely, taking Mt. Gulg in its grasp.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Forename, we may be certain that Vauthry will not look on in idleness as we beat a path to his front door. Once our plans are set in motion, there will be no turning back.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: So see to your preparations as meticulously as you may, and I will give the order to proceed as soon as you are ready.

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: I did everything I could. It will work. It will! I hope it will.

dialogue.name: DULIACHAI
dialogue.text: Everything will be fine, I assure you! No Talos my husband has poured himself into has ever failed, and that is not about to change now!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Give the word, and I will relay the order to awaken the Talos.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: ENGAGE!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Sorry, but I need more time.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Very well! Let us begin!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: It's quite all right. Better to take what time you require than set out unprepared.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: I will see that everyone else is a safe distance away. Go and join your comrades, my friend, and focus only on reaching Vauthry.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Come what may, we must prevail this day!

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: Hahaha! Is there anything you can't do!? A genius is what you are, old boy! A genius among─

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: ...Ahem. I've played my part. The rest is up to you lot now. Carry on!

dialogue.name: DULIACHAI
dialogue.text: Take care, do you hear? Make sure you all come back safe and sound, or I shall be most upset!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: There you are, Forename!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: It's time!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Shall we?

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Vauthry cannot hide from us now!

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: 'Twill not be long before the sin eaters mark our presence. We must expect fierce resistance.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Everyone is here. Good.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: The Talos has taken hold of the mountain. As planned, we will use its body as a bridge to reach Vauthry's sanctuary.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The sin eaters will make us work for every yalm, of course.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: But we will carve a path through their ranks, and meet with their master, regardless.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: For the First!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Last one there's a rotten egg!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Let's be careful, all right?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Small talk.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Form a party and enter Mt. Gulg.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Above us lies Vauthry's new paradise.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: A paradise swarming with sin eaters, in which his own people have no place...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: It ends here. And it ends now.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: When our hunt for the Lightwardens began, I couldn't imagine ever being done with the task.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Yet here we are, ready to lay the last one low. We'll get you there, Forename. Mark my words!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: How many eaters await us up there, do you suppose? A hundred? A thousand?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Not that it matters, of course. Whatever the odds, we will overcome them. Minfilia wanted this world saved, and save it we shall.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Until Thancred freed me, I knew nothing of Norvrandt.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: But in the course of our journey, I've come to love this land and those who call it home. And I will give my all to protect them.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: That which now graspeth the mountain is no mere man of stone.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: 'Tis the hopes of all who have dwelled in this world, both in the past and in the present. 'Tis the prayers of all who yearn for peace, be they near or be they far.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: 'Tis a trivial concern, but I cannot help feeling self-conscious knowing that some of the Night's Blessed are watching.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: In the guise of Master Matoya, I took great pains to cultivate an image of restraint. Yet I don't suppose they will be able to make out all that much from such a distance...meaning I may wreak havoc to my heart's content. I do believe I'm going to enjoy this.

dialogue.name: GUIDESOLDIER03643
dialogue.text: MadamSir! Will you be heading to the Crown of the Immaculate?

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: Proceed to the Crown of the Immaculate?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: With your powers, you could have done so much good...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Well, it looks like we missed it all yet again.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: We've secured an escape route. Do what you must.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: There lieth the last of the Light...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: A dramatic transformation. The result of the sin eater within emerging to claim dominance, I assume.

dialogue.name: GUIDESOLDIER03643
dialogue.text: MadamSir! Will you be heading to the Crown of the Immaculate?

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Is that...Vauthry?

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: I see... It's finally over, then.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Now night will return to all of Norvrandt, bringing salvation to both of our two worlds...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Upon speaking with Ryne, several cutscenes will play in sequence.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: It is recommended that you set aside sufficient time to view these scenes in their entirety.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Should you leave the area, you may return here by speaking with the sentry posted at the entrance to Mt. Gulg.
